title: Spirit Luo Ring - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Xuanhuan
author: Ye Shui Han   夜·水寒
description:
Waging a holy war with the Templar Chief, the ruler of a province. Invading a fortress, the stronghold of a General. Attacking the Holy Emperor, the almighty ruler of the Imperial Dragon Continent!

The Protagonist’s goal: To conquer the Imperial Dragon Continent, to become a Holy Emperor admired by the multitudes. With the Spirit Luo ring in his hand, Xia Yan will stand at the top of the world. With strong faith, an indomitable will, the perfect soul, plus the Spirit Luo Ring, no one shall stop his advance!>
